players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Oh no, Bob is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who did this."
Diana: "Charlie, I investigated you last night and discovered you're the mafioso. You killed Bob."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of a more suspicious target? This seems rushed."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're truly the detective, why reveal your investigation so bluntly? It feels like a desperate attempt to frame me and divert attention from yourself."
Diana: "I revealed it directly because with only 4 players and Bob dead, we can't afford to waste time with hints. I'm the detective, Charlie is the mafioso, and we need to vote him out now to win."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why not investigate me or Bob first? Charlie seems an odd first choice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
